content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Un simple problème de maths utile pour démontrer l'importance des maths au sein de la programmation.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I like it!
I liked the idea! I'll try to solve it, then I'd approve it

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice task.

Your contribution has been uploaded twice. Please remove one of them. The other link is:
https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/75553af174196ceff5bc809d57e9cee2dde76

Goal
* Please change "outputs" to "output".

Input
* Please format "Line 1" in <<bold>>.

* Please delete "(2 ≤ N ≤ 100)".

* Please format "N" as a [[variable]] (twice).

* Please format "Next [[N]] lines" in <<bold>>.

* Please delete "(-1000 < x,y < 1000)".

* Please format "x" and "y" as [[variables]].

Output
* Please format "Line 1" and "Line 2" in <<bold>>.

* You have not mentioned the possibility of outputting {{Not enough points}}.

Constraints
* Please format "N", "x" and "y" as [[variables]].

* The ranges are too wide when comparing what is actually in the test cases. Please revise the ranges and/or the cases.

Cases
* Please revise the cases so that each pair of test and validator are similar but not the same.

* Please revise the cases so that the first given point is less often part of the answer.

Thanks.
Would the author please follow up the last point in my previous comment? Thanks.
